title: GameHub
description: Developed a social gaming platform using the MERN stack (MongoDB, Express.js, React.js, Node.js) with a microservices architecture, enabling users to play games, chat, compete on leaderboards, and manage friends in a clean and efficient system.

title: Crypto Balance Explorer
description:
• Developed a responsive web application utilizing technologies such as Axios, Javascript, HTML, and CSS. 
• Implemented functionality to fetch and display the amount of selected cryptocurrencies from specified addresses on a particular Blockchain. 
• Integrated API interactions to gather real-time data and presented it in a user-friendly table format. 
• Enhanced user experience by incorporating features like exporting data in CSV format and copying to clipboard for seamless data management.
